1487130.name: Catty and Batty: The Spirit Guide Demo
1487130.description:
Catty & Batty 2: The Spirit Guide is a casual couch co-op puzzle game, inspired by Lemmings and Tower Defense! Play as Catty or Batty and build a path to guide spirits home.

In the demo you can play the first 10 levels of the full game!

Here is what you can expect in the complete release:

  • ğŸŒˆ 6 color modes (white, sepia, gray, dark, inverted, gameboy)

Thank you for giving it a try!
